attributes.action: take economic action and liaise as a matter of urgency with the international community to put pressure on the military junta in Burma to respect human rights of monks and start talks to release elected president from house arrest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Military juntas have shown themselves to be extremely undesirable and opposed to democractic practice for their citizens.The monks protesting against the regime are unarmed, some have already been arrested;their human rights and lives in no way protected.
There are Buddhist monks living in this country contributing in a very positive way to local communities. T

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
